trans-unit.source: If you only want to apply a particular profile to the client-side of the connection, specify client-side for the profile's context.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅要将特定配置文件应用于连接的 client-side ，请为配置文件的 context 指定客户端。

trans-unit.source: If you only want to apply a particular profile to the server-side of the connection, specify server-side for the profile's context.
trans-unit.target: 如果只想将特定的配置文件应用于连接的 server-side ，请为配置文件的 context 指定服务器端。

trans-unit.source: If you pass empty string the CD will be ejected from VM.
trans-unit.target: 如果传入空字符串,CD将从VM中弹出。

trans-unit.source: If you pass including and excluding values to the filter, for example, filter=!general,users, the excluding values, !general in this case, will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: If you pass including and excluding values to the filter, for example, filter=!general,users, the excluding values, !general in this case, will be ignored.

trans-unit.source: If you pass including and excluding values to the filter, for example, filter=!settings,ver, the excluding values will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果将包含和排除值传递给过滤器，例如filter =！settings，ver，则排除值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you pass including and excluding values to the filter, for example, filter=!settings,version, the excluding values, !settings in this case, will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果将包含值和排除值传递给过滤器，例如filter =！settings，version，则排除值（在这种情况下为 !settings )将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you plan to repeat a task like this, use the ansible.builtin.template module in a playbook.
trans-unit.target: If you plan to repeat a task like this, use the ansible.builtin.template module in a playbook.

trans-unit.source: If you plan to repeat a task like this, use the template module in a playbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算重复执行这样的任务，请在剧本中使用模板模块。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer a GUI for handling dynamic inventory, the Red Hat Ansible Tower inventory database syncs with all your dynamic inventory sources, provides web and REST access to the results, and offers a graphical inventory editor. With a database record of all of your hosts, you can correlate past event history and see which hosts have had failures on their last playbook runs.
trans-unit.target: If you prefer a GUI for handling dynamic inventory, the Red Hat Ansible Tower inventory database syncs with all your dynamic inventory sources, provides web and REST access to the results, and offers a graphical inventory editor. With a database record of all of your hosts, you can correlate past event history and see which hosts have had failures on their last playbook runs.

trans-unit.source: If you prefer to read the entire User Guide, here’s a list of the pages in order:
trans-unit.target: If you prefer to read the entire User Guide, here’s a list of the pages in order:

trans-unit.source: If you prefer to read the entire guide, here’s a list of the pages in order.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想阅读整个指南，请按顺序列出以下页面。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer to type your ansible-vault password rather than store it in a file, you can request a prompt:
trans-unit.target: 如果你喜欢键入你的ansible-vault密码,而不是把它存储在文件中,你可以请求一个提示。

trans-unit.source: If you provide more than one path, it will implement a first_found logic, and will not process entries it already processed in previous paths. This enables merging different trees in order of importance, or add role_vars to specific paths to influence different instances of the same role.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供了多个路径,它将实现first_found逻辑,并且不会处理它在之前路径中已经处理的条目。这样就可以按照重要性的顺序合并不同的树,或者在特定的路径中添加角色变量来影响同一角色的不同实例。

trans-unit.source: If you ran these four tasks in a playbook with --tags ntp, Ansible would run the three tasks tagged ntp and skip the one task that does not have that tag.
trans-unit.target: If you ran these four tasks in a playbook with --tags ntp , Ansible would run the three tasks tagged ntp and skip the one task that does not have that tag.

trans-unit.source: If you receive an connection error please double check the inventory and playbook for typos or missing lines. If the issue still occurs follow the debug steps in Network Debug and Troubleshooting Guide.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到连接错误，请仔细检查清单和手册，以了解是否有错别字或缺少行。如果问题仍然存在，请遵循《网络调试和故障排除指南》中的调试步骤。

trans-unit.source: If you require a templated payload, use the content parameter together with the template lookup plugin, or use template.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要模板化的有效负载，请将 content 参数与 template 查找插件一起使用，或使用模板。

trans-unit.source: If you run a playbook like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果你运行一个这样的剧本。

trans-unit.source: If you run or skip certain tags by default, you can use the TAGS_RUN and TAGS_SKIP options in Ansible configuration to set those defaults.
trans-unit.target: If you run or skip certain tags by default, you can use the TAGS_RUN and TAGS_SKIP options in Ansible configuration to set those defaults.

trans-unit.source: If you run this get_host_record.yml playbook, you should see results similar to the following:

trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 ansible-playbook 命令运行此剧本，则会在下面看到输出。此示例使用 -l 选项将剧本限制为仅在rtr1节点上执行。

trans-unit.source: If you run this playbook, Ansible invokes the debugger when the task fails. From the debug prompt, you can change the module arguments or the variables and run the task again.
trans-unit.target: 如果你运行这个剧本,Ansible会在任务失败时调用调试器。从调试提示中,你可以更改模块参数或变量,并再次运行任务。

trans-unit.source: If you save Ansible output to a log, you expose any secret data in your Ansible output, such as passwords and user names. To keep sensitive values out of your logs, mark tasks that expose them with the no_log: True attribute. However, the no_log attribute does not affect debugging output, so be careful not to debug playbooks in a production environment. See How do I keep secret data in my playbook? for an example.
trans-unit.target: If you save Ansible output to a log, you expose any secret data in your Ansible output, such as passwords and user names. To keep sensitive values out of your logs, mark tasks that expose them with the no_log: True attribute. However, the no_log attribute does not affect debugging output, so be careful not to debug playbooks in a production environment. See How do I keep secret data in my playbook? for an example.

trans-unit.source: If you save Ansible output to a log, you expose any secret data in your Ansible output, such as passwords and user names. To keep sensitive values out of your logs, mark tasks that expose them with the no_log: True attribute. However, the no_log attribute does not affect debugging output, so be careful not to debug playbooks in a production environment. See How do I keep secret data in my playbook? for an example.
trans-unit.target: 如果将Ansible输出保存到日志，则会在Ansible输出中公开任何秘密数据，例如密码和用户名。要使敏感值不进入日志，请使用 no_log: True 属性标记将其公开的任务。但是， no_log 属性不会影响调试输出，因此请注意不要在生产环境中调试剧本。请参阅如何在我的剧本中保存机密数据？举个例子

trans-unit.source: If you see this error message, the task that generated it requires enable mode to succeed:
trans-unit.target: 如果看到此错误消息，则生成它的任务需要 enable 模式才能成功：

trans-unit.source: If you set any_errors_fatal and a task returns an error, Ansible finishes the fatal task on all hosts in the current batch, then stops executing the play on all hosts. Subsequent tasks and plays are not executed. You can recover from fatal errors by adding a rescue section to the block. You can set any_errors_fatal at the play or block level:
trans-unit.target: If you set any_errors_fatal and a task returns an error, Ansible finishes the fatal task on all hosts in the current batch, then stops executing the play on all hosts. Subsequent tasks and plays are not executed. You can recover from fatal errors by adding a rescue section to the block. You can set any_errors_fatal at the play or block level:

trans-unit.source: If you set include_global_types=true, when AWS Config adds support for a new type of global resource, it starts recording resources of that type automatically.
trans-unit.target: If you set include_global_types=true, when AWS Config adds support for a new type of global resource, it starts recording resources of that type automatically.

trans-unit.source: If you set include_global_types=true, you must also set all_supported=true.
trans-unit.target: If you set include_global_types=true, you must also set all_supported=true.

trans-unit.source: If you set the connection to local and there is no ansible_python_interpreter set, modules will run under /usr/bin/python and not under {{ ansible_playbook_python }}. Be sure to set ansible_python_interpreter: “{{ ansible_playbook_python }}” in host_vars/localhost.yml, for example. You can avoid this issue by using local_action or delegate_to: localhost instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将连接设置为本地，并且未设置ansible_python_interpreter，则模块将在/ usr / bin / python下运行，而不在{{ansible_playbook_python}}下运行。例如，请确保在host_vars / localhost.yml中设置ansible_python_interpreter：“ {{ansible_playbook_python}}”。您可以通过使用 local_action 或 delegate_to: localhost _to ：localhost来避免此问题。

trans-unit.source: If you set this option to yes, you must manually re-enable the resource before the system can use it for load balancing connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此选项设置为 yes ，则必须手动重新启用资源，然后系统才能将其用于负载平衡连接。

trans-unit.source: If you set this option to `true`, when AWS Config adds support for a new type of global resource, it starts recording resources of that type automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将此选项设置为 "true",当AWS Config为新类型的全局资源添加支持时,它会自动开始记录该类型的资源。

trans-unit.source: If you set this option to `true`, when AWS Config adds support for a new type of regional resource, it starts recording resources of that type automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将此选项设置为 "true",当AWS Config为新类型的区域资源添加支持时,它会自动开始记录该类型的资源。

trans-unit.source: If you set this option to `true`, you cannot enumerate a list of `resource_types`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你把这个选项设置为 "true",你就不能枚举一个 "resource_types "的列表。

trans-unit.source: If you set this parameter to enabled or enabled-no-delete, you must also ensure that the virtual_server_discovery parameter is also set to enabled or enabled-no-delete.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此参数设置为 enabled 或 enabled-no-delete ，还必须确保 virtual_server_discovery 参数也设置为 enabled 或 enabled-no-delete 。

trans-unit.source: If you set this parameter to enabled or enabled-no-delete, you must also ensure the virtual_server_discovery parameter is also set to enabled or enabled-no-delete.
trans-unit.target: If you set this parameter to enabled or enabled-no-delete , you must also ensure the virtual_server_discovery parameter is also set to enabled or enabled-no-delete .

The only caveat is that you will need a virtual network with one subnet already in your resource group. Assuming you have a virtual network already with an existing subnet, you can run the following to create a VM:
trans-unit.target: 如果你只是想创建一个虚拟机,而不指定所有的细节,你也可以这样做。唯一需要注意的是,你需要一个资源组中已有一个子网的虚拟网络。假设你已经有了一个具有现有子网的虚拟网络,你可以运行以下步骤来创建虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: If you simply wish to forward the traffic without translating the port, this should be the same as the Public port.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只是想转发流量,而不翻译端口,这应该与公共端口相同。

trans-unit.source: If you specified a port override when you registered a target, you must specify both the target ID and the port when you deregister it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在注册目标时指定了端口覆盖,则必须在取消注册时同时指定目标 ID 和端口。

trans-unit.source: If you specify --tags or --skip-tags multiple times on the command line, Ansible will merge the specified tags together. In previous versions of Ansible, you could set merge_multiple_cli_tags to False if you wanted to keep only the last-specified --tags. This config option existed for backwards compatibility. The overwriting behavior was deprecated in 2.3 and the default behavior was changed in 2.4. Ansible-2.7 removes the config option; multiple --tags are now always merged.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在命令行上多次指定 --tags 或 --skip-tags ，Ansible会将指定的标签合并在一起。在Ansible的早期版本中，您可以设置 merge_multiple_cli_tags 到 False ，如果你想保持只有最后指定 --tags 。存在此配置选项是为了向后兼容。覆盖行为在2.3中已弃用，默认行为在2.4中已更改。Ansible-2.7删除了config选项；现在，始终会合并多个 --tags 。

trans-unit.source: If you specify PUBLIC as the user (role), then the privilege changes apply to all users (roles). You may not specify password or role_attr_flags when the PUBLIC user is specified.
trans-unit.target: If you specify PUBLIC as the user (role), then the privilege changes apply to all users (roles). You may not specify password or role_attr_flags when the PUBLIC user is specified.

trans-unit.source: If you specify PUBLIC as the user (role), then the privilege changes will apply to all users (roles). You may not specify password or role_attr_flags when the PUBLIC user is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果你指定PUBLIC作为用户(角色),那么权限变化将应用于所有用户(角色)。当指定PUBLIC用户时,你可以不指定密码或role_attr_flags。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a catchall destination (for example, 0.0.0.0 for IPv4, :: for IPv6) the mask parameter is set to any or any6 respectively.
trans-unit.target: If you specify a catchall destination (for example, 0.0.0.0 for IPv4, :: for IPv6) the mask parameter is set to any or any6 respectively.

trans-unit.source: If you use one vault ID more frequently than any other, you can set the config option DEFAULT_VAULT_IDENTITY_LIST to specify a default vault ID and password source. Ansible will use the default vault ID and source any time you do not specify --vault-id. You can set multiple values for this option. Setting multiple values is equivalent to passing multiple --vault-id cli options.
trans-unit.target: 如果您更频繁地使用一个文件库ID，则可以设置配置选项DEFAULT_VAULT_IDENTITY_LIST以指定默认文件库ID和密码源。每当您不指定 --vault-id 时，Ansible将使用默认的保管库ID和来源。您可以为此选项设置多个值。设置多个值等效于传递多个 --vault-id cli选项。

trans-unit.source: If you use one vault password file more frequently than any other, you can set the DEFAULT_VAULT_PASSWORD_FILE config option or the ANSIBLE_VAULT_PASSWORD_FILE environment variable to specify that file. For example, if you set ANSIBLE_VAULT_PASSWORD_FILE=~/.vault_pass.txt, Ansible will automatically search for the password in that file. This is useful if, for example, you use Ansible from a continuous integration system such as Jenkins.
trans-unit.target: 如果您更频繁地使用一个文件库密码文件，则可以设置DEFAULT_VAULT_PASSWORD_FILE配置选项或 ANSIBLE_VAULT_PASSWORD_FILE 环境变量来指定该文件。例如，如果您设置 ANSIBLE_VAULT_PASSWORD_FILE=~/.vault_pass.txt ，则Ansible将自动在该文件中搜索密码。例如，如果您从诸如Jenkins之类的持续集成系统中使用Ansible，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: If you want to apply the same tag or tags to multiple tasks without adding a tags line to every task, you can define the tags at the level of your play or block, or when you add a role or import a file. Ansible applies the tags down the dependency chain to all child tasks. With roles and imports, Ansible appends the tags set by the roles section or import to any tags set on individual tasks or blocks within the role or imported file. This is called tag inheritance. Tag inheritance is convenient, because you do not have to tag every task. However, the tags still apply to the tasks individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果要对多个任务应用相同的一个或多个标签而不在每个任务上添加 tags 行，则可以在播放或块级别或添加角色或导入文件时定义标签。Ansible将标签沿依赖关系链应用于所有子任务。对于角色和导入，Ansible将 roles 部分设置的标签追加或导入到在角色或导入文件中的各个任务或块上设置的任何标签。这称为标签继承。标记继承很方便，因为您不必标记每个任务。但是，标签仍单独应用于任务。

trans-unit.source: If you want to match the whole string and you are using * make sure to always wraparound your regular expression with the start/end anchors. trans-unit.target: 如果要匹配整个字符串，并且正在使用 * ,请确保始终使用开始/结束锚点包装正则表达式。例如 ^(.*)$ 将始终只匹配一个结果，而在某些Python版本上， (.*) 将匹配整个字符串，最后匹配一个空字符串，这意味着它将进行两次替换。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a task on one host with reference to other hosts, use the ‘delegate_to’ keyword on a task. This is ideal for placing nodes in a load balanced pool, or removing them. It is also very useful for controlling outage windows. Be aware that it does not make sense to delegate all tasks, debug, add_host, include, etc always get executed on the controller. Using this with the ‘serial’ keyword to control the number of hosts executing at one time is also a good idea:
trans-unit.target: 如果要参考其他主机在一个主机上执行任务，请在任务上使用'delegate_to'关键字。这是将节点放置在负载平衡池中或将其删除的理想选择。这对于控制中断窗口也非常有用。请注意，委派所有任务，调试，add_host，include等总是在控制器上执行是没有意义的。将它与'serial'关键字一起使用来控制一次执行的主机数量也是一个好主意：

trans-unit.source: If you want to run a command through a shell (say you are using <, >, |, etc), you actually want the ansible.windows.win_shell module instead. The ansible.windows.win_command module is much more secure as it’s not affected by the user’s environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果要通过外壳运行命令（例如您正在使用 < ， > ， | 等），则实际上需要使用ansible.windows.win_shell模块。该ansible.windows.win_command模块是更安全的，因为它不影响用户的使用环境。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run a command through a shell (say you are using <, >, |, etc), you actually want the win_shell module instead. The win_command module is much more secure as it’s not affected by the user’s environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果要通过外壳运行命令（例如您正在使用 < ， > ， | 等），则实际上需要使用win_shell模块。该 win_command 模块是更安全的，因为它不影响用户的使用环境。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run a command through the shell (say you are using <, >, |, etc), you actually want the ansible.builtin.shell module instead. Parsing shell metacharacters can lead to unexpected commands being executed if quoting is not done correctly so it is more secure to use the command module when possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果要通过外壳运行命令（例如您正在使用 < ， > ， | 等），则实际上需要使用ansible.builtin.shell模块。如果未正确执行引用，解析外壳元字符可能会导致执行意外命令，因此在可能的情况下使用 command 模块会更安全。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run a command through the shell (say you are using <, >, |, etc), you actually want the shell module instead. Parsing shell metacharacters can lead to unexpected commands being executed if quoting is not done correctly so it is more secure to use the command module when possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果要通过外壳运行命令（例如您正在使用 < ， > ， | 等），则实际上需要外壳模块。如果未正确执行引用，解析外壳元字符可能会导致执行意外命令，因此在可能的情况下使用 command 模块会更安全。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run a command through the shell (say you are using <, >, |, etc), you must specify a shell in the command such as /bin/bash -c "/path/to/something | grep else".
trans-unit.target: 如果要通过外壳运行命令（例如您正在使用 < ， > ， | 等），则必须在命令中指定外壳，例如 /bin/bash -c "/path/to/something | grep else" 。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run an executable securely and predictably, it may be better to use the ansible.windows.win_command module instead. Best practices when writing playbooks will follow the trend of using ansible.windows.win_command unless win_shell is explicitly required. When running ad-hoc commands, use your best judgement.
trans-unit.target: 如果要安全且可预测地运行可执行文件，最好改用ansible.windows.win_command模块。最佳做法时写剧本会按照使用的趋势ansible.windows.win_command除非 win_shell 明确要求。运行临时命令时，请根据您的最佳判断。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run an executable securely and predictably, it may be better to use the win_command module instead. Best practices when writing playbooks will follow the trend of using win_command unless win_shell is explicitly required. When running ad-hoc commands, use your best judgement.
trans-unit.target: 如果要安全且可预测地运行可执行文件，则最好使用win_command模块。最佳做法时写剧本会按照使用的趋势win_command除非 win_shell 明确要求。运行临时命令时，请根据您的最佳判断。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run multiple tasks in a playbook concurrently, use async with poll set to 0. When you set poll: 0, Ansible starts the task and immediately moves on to the next task without waiting for a result. Each async task runs until it either completes, fails or times out (runs longer than its async value). The playbook run ends without checking back on async tasks.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在一个剧本同时运行多个任务，使用 async 与 poll 当设置设置为0 poll: 0 ，Ansible启动任务，并立即到下一个任务移动而不等待结果。每个异步任务一直运行到完成，失败或超时（运行时间超过其 async 值）为止。该剧本的运行无需结束异步任务即可结束。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run this command every day, you can save it in a playbook and run it with ansible-playbook instead of ansible. The playbook can store a lot of the parameters you provided with flags at the command line, leaving less to type at the command line. You need two files for this - a playbook and an inventory file.
trans-unit.target: 如果要每天运行此命令，可以将其保存在剧本中，然后使用 ansible-playbook 而不是 ansible 来运行它。该剧本可以在命令行中存储您为标志提供的许多参数，而在命令行中键入的参数却很少。为此，您需要两个文件-一个剧本和一个清单文件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run this command every day, you can save it in a playbook and run it with ansible-playbook instead of ansible. The playbook can store a lot of the parameters you provided with flags at the command line, leaving less to type at the command line. You need two files for this - a playbook and an inventory file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想每天都运行这个命令,你可以把它保存在playbook中,然后用ansible-playbook代替ansible来运行它。playbook可以存储很多你在命令行用标志提供的参数,从而减少在命令行输入的内容。为此你需要两个文件--一个playbook和一个清单文件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set a longer timeout limit for a certain task in your playbook, use async with poll set to a positive value. Ansible will still block the next task in your playbook, waiting until the async task either completes, fails or times out. However, the task will only time out if it exceeds the timeout limit you set with the async parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果要为剧本中的某个任务设置更长的超时限制，请使用将 poll 设置为正值的 async 。Ansible仍会阻止剧本中的下一个任务，直到异步任务完成，失败或超时为止。但是，仅当任务超过您使用 async 参数设置的超时限制时，该任务才会超时。

trans-unit.source: If you want your playbook to prompt the user for certain input, add a ‘vars_prompt’ section. For example, if you use one playbook across multiple software releases, you could prompt for the particular release version.

trans-unit.source: If you would like a GUI for handling dynamic inventory, the Red Hat Ansible Tower inventory database syncs with all your dynamic inventory sources, provides web and REST access to the results, and offers a graphical inventory editor. With a database record of all of your hosts, you can correlate past event history and see which hosts have had failures on their last playbook runs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望使用GUI来处理动态库存，那么Red Hat Ansible Tower库存数据库将与您的所有动态库存源同步，提供对结果的Web和REST访问，并提供图形库存编辑器。使用所有主机的数据库记录，您可以关联过去的事件历史记录，并查看哪些主机在其上一次运行的手册上发生了故障。

trans-unit.source: If you write a custom module (see Should you develop a module?) or a plugin (see Developing plugins), you might wish to distribute it as part of a role. For example, if you write a module that helps configure your company’s internal software, and you want other people in your organization to use this module, but you do not want to tell everyone how to configure their Ansible library path, you can include the module in your internal_config role.
trans-unit.target: 如果您编写自定义模块（请参见是否应该开发模块？）或插件（请参见开发plugins），则可能希望将其作为角色的一部分进行分发。例如，如果您编写一个有助于配置公司内部软件的模块，并且希望组织中的其他人使用此模块，但又不想告诉所有人如何配置其Ansible库路径，则可以包含该模块在您的internal_config角色中。

trans-unit.source: If you write a custom module (see Should you develop a module?) or a plugin (see Developing plugins), you may wish to distribute it as part of a role. Generally speaking, Ansible as a project is very interested in taking high-quality modules into ansible core for inclusion, so this shouldn’t be the norm, but it’s quite easy to do.
trans-unit.target: 如果您编写自定义模块（请参见是否应该开发模块？）或插件（请参见开发plugins），则可能希望将其作为角色的一部分进行分发。总体而言，Ansible作为一个项目非常有兴趣将高质量的模块纳入ansible核心以使其包含在内，因此这不应该成为常态，但很容易做到。

trans-unit.source: If you're running Ansible from an ECS instance with RAM Instance using RAM Role, Ansible will just access the metadata http://100.100.100.200/latest/meta-data/ram/security-credentials/<ecs_role_name> to obtain the STS credential. This is a preferred approach over any other when running in ECS as you can avoid hard coding credentials. Instead these are leased on-the-fly by Ansible which reduces the chance of leakage.
trans-unit.target: 如果您通过具有使用RAM Role的RAM实例的ECS实例从ECS实例运行Ansible，Ansible将仅访问元数据http://100.100.100.200/latest/meta-data/ram/security-credentials/ <ecs_role_name>以获得STS凭据。在ECS中运行时，这是比其他任何方法都更可取的方法，因为可以避免对凭据进行硬编码。相反，这些由Ansible即时租用，从而减少了泄漏的机会。

trans-unit.source: If you're using the CloudFront domain name for your distribution, such as 123456789abcde.cloudfront.net you should set cloudfront_default_certificate=true
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用CloudFront域名进行分发，例如 123456789abcde.cloudfront.net ，则应设置cloudfront_default_certificate = true

trans-unit.source: If your Ansible inventory fluctuates over time, with hosts spinning up and shutting down in response to business demands, the static inventory solutions described in How to build your inventory will not serve your needs. You may need to track hosts from multiple sources: cloud providers, LDAP, Cobbler, and/or enterprise CMDB systems.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的Ansible库存随时间波动，而主机因应业务需求而旋转或关闭，则如何建立库存中所述的静态库存解决方案将无法满足您的需求。您可能需要跟踪来自多个来源的主机：云提供商，LDAP，Cobbler和/或企业CMDB系统。

trans-unit.source: If your OpenShift Python library is not 0.9.0 or newer and you are trying to remove an item from an associative array/dictionary, for example a label or an annotation, you will need to explicitly set the value of the item to be removed to null. Simply deleting the entry in the dictionary will not remove it from openshift or kubernetes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的OpenShift Python库不是0.9.0或更高版本，并且您试图从关联数组/字典中删除某项（例如标签或注释），则需要显式设置要删除的项的值，以 null 。仅仅删除字典中的条目不会将其从openshift或kubernetes中删除。

trans-unit.source: If your URL includes an escaped slash character (%2F) this module will convert it to a real slash. This is a result of the behaviour of the System.Uri class as described in the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的URL包含转义的斜杠字符（％2F），则此模块会将其转换为真实的斜杠。这是文档中描述的System.Uri类的行为的结果。

trans-unit.source: If your callback does not inherit from CallbackBase (directly or indirectly via another callback), it will still work, but issue a deprecation notice. To avoid this and ensure it works in the future change it to inherit from CallbackBase so it has the new options handling methods and properties. You can also implement the new options handling methods and properties but that won’t automatically inherit changes added in the future. You can look at CallbackBase itself and/or AnsiblePlugin for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回调没有从 CallbackBase 继承（直接或通过另一个回调间接），它将仍然有效，但会发出弃用通知。为了避免这种情况并确保将来可以使用，请将其更改为从 CallbackBase 继承，因此它具有新的选项处理方法和属性。您还可以实现新的选项处理方法和属性，但不会自动继承将来添加的更改。您可以查看 CallbackBase 本身和/或 AnsiblePlugin 了解详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If your playbook uses multiple encrypted variables or files that you encrypted with different passwords, you must pass the vault IDs when you run that playbook. You can use --vault-id by itself, with --vault-password-file, or with --ask-vault-pass. The pattern is the same as when you create encrypted content: include the label and the source for the matching password.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的剧本使用多个加密变量或使用不同密码加密的文件，则在运行该剧本时必须传递库ID。您可以使用 --vault-id 本身带有 --vault-password-file ，或 --ask-vault-pass 。该模式与创建加密内容时的模式相同：包括标签和匹配密码的来源。

trans-unit.source: If your vCenter or ESXi server is not setup with proper CA certificates that can be verified from the Ansible server, then it is necessary to disable validation of these certificates by using the validate_certs parameter. To do this you need to set validate_certs=False in your playbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用可从Ansible服务器进行验证的正确的CA证书来设置vCenter或ESXi服务器，则有必要使用 validate_certs 参数禁用对这些证书的验证。为此，您需要在剧本中设置 validate_certs=False 。

trans-unit.source: If your vCenter server is not setup with proper CA certificates that can be verified from the Ansible server, then it is necessary to disable validation of these certificates by using the validate_certs parameter. To do this you need to set validate_certs=False in your playbook.

trans-unit.source: Importing Playbooks
trans-unit.target: 导入游戏本

trans-unit.source: Importing cache plugins directly is deprecated and will be removed in Ansible 2.12. Use the plugin_loader so direct options, environment variables, and other means of configuration can be reconciled using the config system rather than constants.
trans-unit.target: 直接导入缓存插件已被废弃,并将在Ansible 2.12中被移除。使用plugin_loader,这样直接的选项、环境变量和其他配置方式可以使用config系统而不是常量来调节。

trans-unit.source: Importing incorporates playbooks in other playbooks statically. Ansible runs the plays and tasks in each imported playbook in the order they are listed, just as if they had been defined directly in the master playbook.
trans-unit.target: 导入时静态地合并了其他剧本中的剧本。Ansible按照列出的顺序运行每个导入的剧本和任务,就像它们直接在主剧本中定义一样。

trans-unit.source: Importing roles, tasks, or playbooks adds them to a playbook statically. Ansible pre-processes imported files and roles before it runs any tasks in a playbook, so imported content is never affected by other tasks within the top-level playbook.
trans-unit.target: 导入角色、任务或剧本会将它们静态地添加到剧本中。Ansible在运行剧本中的任何任务之前会对导入的文件和角色进行预处理,因此导入的内容永远不会受到顶层剧本中其他任务的影响。

trans-unit.source: Importing roles: static reuse
trans-unit.target: 导入角色:静态重用

trans-unit.target: 从数据中心服务器导入数据中心对象。<br>数据中心对象表示云环境中的对象，例如虚拟机，群集，网络等。<br>使用show-data-center-content命令执行以下操作：请参阅可以从数据中心服务器导入的数据中心对象。

trans-unit.source: In 2.10 the default setting for conditional_bare_variables will change to false. In 2.12 the old behavior will be deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 在2.10中， conditional_bare_variables 的默认设置将更改为 false 。在2.12中，旧行为将被弃用。

trans-unit.source: In 2.4 and above you can just put it in the main Ansible configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4及以上版本中,你可以把它放在Ansible主配置文件中。

trans-unit.source: In 2.4, the default has change to merge the tags. You can enable the old overwriting behavior via the config option.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4版本中,默认的是合并标签,您可以通过配置选项启用旧的覆盖行为。你可以通过配置选项启用旧的覆盖行为。

trans-unit.source: In 2.4, the default will be to merge the tags. You can enable the old overwriting behavior via the config option. In 2.5, multiple --tags options will be merged with no way to go back to the old behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4中，默认设置是合并标签。您可以通过config选项启用旧的覆盖行为。在2.5中，多个 --tags 选项将被合并而无法返回到旧的行为。

trans-unit.source: In 2.4, this module has been renamed from s3 into aws_s3.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4中，此模块已从 s3 重命名为aws_s3。

trans-unit.source: In 2.4.1 we added a toggle to allow you to control this behaviour, ‘top’ will be the pre 2.4, ‘bottom’ will use the current playbook hosting the task and ‘all’ will use them all from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4.1中，我们添加了一个切换开关，可让您控制此行为，“ top”将是2.4之前的版本，“ bottom”将使用托管任务的当前剧本，“ all”将自上而下使用它们。

trans-unit.source: In 2.5 issubset and issuperset were renamed to subset and superset
trans-unit.target: 在2.5中， issubset 和 issuperset 被重命名为 subset 和 superset

trans-unit.source: In 2.5 version_compare was renamed to version
trans-unit.target: 在2.5 version version_compare 重命名为version

trans-unit.source: In 2.5 the following tests were renamed to remove the is_ prefix
trans-unit.target: 在2.5中，以下测试被重命名以删除 is_ 前缀

trans-unit.source: In 2.5 this was updated from vars to task_vars to avoid conflicts with the vars() python function.
trans-unit.target: 在2.5中，此功能已从 vars 更新为 task_vars ,以避免与 vars() python函数发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: In 2.5 this was updated from vars to task_vars to not conflict with the vars() python function.
trans-unit.target: 在2.5中，它已从 vars 更新为 task_vars ,以不与 vars() python函数冲突。

trans-unit.source: In 2.5, multiple --tags options will be merged with no way to go back to the old behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在2.5中，多个 --tags 选项将被合并，无法恢复到原来的行为。

trans-unit.source: In 2.5, this module has been renamed from osx_say to community.general.say.
trans-unit.target: 在2.5中，此模块已从 osx_say 重命名为community.general.say。

trans-unit.source: In 2.5, this module has been renamed from osx_say to say.
trans-unit.target: 在2.5中，此模块已从 osx_say 重命名为say。

trans-unit.source: In 2.8, this callback has been renamed from osx_say into say.
trans-unit.target: 在2.8中，此回调已从 osx_say 重命名为say。

trans-unit.source: In 2.8, this callback has been renamed from osx_say into community.general.say.
trans-unit.target: 在2.8中，此回调已从 osx_say 重命名为community.general.say。

trans-unit.source: In TMOS version 12.x prober_pool can be set to empty string to revert to default setting of inherit.
trans-unit.target: 在 TMOS 版本 12.x 中,可以将prober_pool设置为空字符串以恢复为继承的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: In TMOS version 12.x, prober_pool can be set to an empty string to revert to default setting of inherit.
trans-unit.target: 在 TMOS 版本 12.x ，prober_pool可以设置为空字符串恢复到默认设置的 inherit 。

trans-unit.source: In TMOS version 13.x and later, this parameter is mandatory when prober_preference is set to pool.
trans-unit.target: 在 TMOS 版本 13.x 和更高版本中，当 prober_preference 设置为 pool 时，此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: In dvPortMirror session, Distributed Ports can be used as both source and destination entities.
trans-unit.target: 在 dvPortMirror 会话中，分布式端口既可以用作源实体，也可以用作目标实体。

trans-unit.source: In encapsulatedRemoteMirrorSource session, Distributed Ports can be used as source entities, and IP address can be used as destination entities.
trans-unit.target: 在 encapsulatedRemoteMirrorSource 会话中，分布式端口可用作源实体，而IP地址可用作目标实体。

trans-unit.source: In group_vars files, use the full key name: ansible_network_os: vyos.vyos.vyos.
trans-unit.target: 在 group_vars 文件中，使用完整 key 名： ansible_network_os: vyos.vyos.vyos 。

trans-unit.source: In group_vars files, use the full key name: ansible_network_os: vyos.
trans-unit.target: 在 group_vars 文件中，使用完整 key 名： ansible_network_os: vyos 。

trans-unit.source: In remoteMirrorDest session, VLAN IDs can be used as source entities, and Distributed Ports can be used as destination entities.
trans-unit.target: 在 remoteMirrorDest 会话中，VLAN ID可用作源实体，而Distributed Ports可用作目标实体。

trans-unit.source: In remoteMirrorSource session, Distributed Ports can be used as source entities, and uplink ports name can be used as destination entities.
trans-unit.target: 在 remoteMirrorSource 会话中，“分布式端口”可用作源实体，而“上行链路端口”名称可用作目标实体。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 1.4 and later you can configure an additional roles_path to search for roles. Use this to check all of your common roles out to one location, and share them easily between multiple playbook projects. See Configuring Ansible for details about how to set this up in ansible.cfg.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 1.4和更高版本中，您可以配置其他role_path来搜索角色。使用此功能可以将所有常见角色检出到一个位置，并在多个剧本项目之间轻松共享它们。有关如何在ansible.cfg中进行设置的详细信息，请参见配置 Ansible。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 1.6 and later, this module can also be used to wait for a file to be available or absent on the filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 1.6及以后的版本中,这个模块也可以用来等待文件系统中的文件是否可用。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 1.8 and later, this module can also be used to wait for active connections to be closed before continuing, useful if a node is being rotated out of a load balancer pool.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 1.8及以后的版本中,这个模块还可以用来等待活动连接关闭后再继续,如果一个节点被轮换出负载均衡器池,这个模块很有用。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.0 a bug in the synchronize module made become occur on the “local host”. This was fixed in Ansible 2.0.1.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.0中，在“本地主机”上发生了同步模块中的错误。此问题已在Ansible 2.0.1中修复。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.0, the concept of dynamic includes was introduced. Due to some limitations with making all includes dynamic in this way, the ability to force includes to be static was introduced in Ansible 2.1. Because the include task became overloaded to encompass both static and dynamic syntaxes, and because the default behavior of an include could change based on other options set on the Task, Ansible 2.4 introduces the concept of include vs. import.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.0中，引入了动态包含的概念。由于以这种方式使所有包含动态化存在一些限制，因此Ansible 2.1中引入了强制包含静态的能力。因为include任务变得超载以包含静态和动态语法，并且因为include的默认行为可能会根据Task上设置的其他选项而改变，所以Ansible 2.4引入了 include vs. import 的概念。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.10 and later, The ansible/ansible repository contains the code for basic features and functions, such as copying module code to managed nodes. This code is also known as ansible-base.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.10和更高版本中，ansible / ansible存储库包含基本功能的代码，例如将模块代码复制到受管节点。此代码也称为 ansible-base 。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.10 and later, inventory scripts moved to their associated collections. Many are now in the community.general scripts/inventory directory. We recommend you use Inventory Plugins instead.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.10及更高版本中，清单脚本移至其关联的集合。现在许多文件位于community.general scripts / inventory目录中。我们建议您改用库存插件。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.12, Ansible will switch the default from auto_legacy to auto. The difference in behaviour is that auto_legacy uses /usr/bin/python if present and falls back to the discovered Python when it is not present. auto will always use the discovered Python, regardless of whether /usr/bin/python exists. The auto_legacy setting provides compatibility with previous versions of Ansible that always defaulted to /usr/bin/python.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.12中，Ansible将默认值从 auto_legacy 切换为 auto 。行为上的区别是 auto_legacy 使用/ usr / bin / python（如果存在），而在不存在时回退到发现的Python。 auto 将始终使用发现的Python，无论/ usr / bin / python是否存在。该 auto_legacy 设置提供Ansible总是默认为以前版本的兼容性的/ usr / bin中/ Python的。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.2 (and possibly earlier) the async: keyword could not be used in conjunction with the action plugins such as service. This limitation has been removed in Ansible 2.3
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.2（甚至更早的版本）中， async: 关键字不能与action插件（例如 service )结合使用。此限制已在Ansible 2.3中删除

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.3 this module was using mount and umount commands only, requiring root access. This is no longer needed with the introduction of 7zip for extraction.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.3中，此模块仅使用 mount 和 umount 命令，需要root访问权限。引入7zip提取不再需要此功能。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.3 this option changed from 'mime' to 'get_mime' and the default changed to 'Yes'.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.3中,这个选项从'mime'改为'get_mime',默认值改为'Yes'。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.3, persistent connection sockets are stored in ~/.ansible/pc for all network devices. When an Ansible playbook runs, the persistent socket connection is displayed when verbose output is specified.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.3中，所有网络设备的持久连接套接字都存储在 ~/.ansible/pc 中。运行Ansible剧本时，如果指定详细输出，则会显示持久套接字连接。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.4 and earlier, this could only be run on Server 2012/Windows 8 or newer. Since Ansible 2.5 this restriction has been lifted.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.4和更早的版本中,这只能在Server 2012/Windows 8或更新版本上运行。自Ansible 2.5以来,这一限制已被取消。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.5 and lower facts are always returned in raw format.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.5及以下的事实总是以原始格式返回。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.5 or later, playbook authors are encouraged to use fail_when or ignore_errors to get this ability. They may also explicitly set fail_on_missing to no to get the non-failing behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.5或更高版本，剧本的作者是鼓励使用 fail_when 或 ignore_errors 获得这种能力。他们还可以将 fail_on_missing 显式设置为 no ,以获取无故障行为。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.5, a new Jinja2 function called query was added for invoking lookup plugins. The difference between lookup and query is largely that query will always return a list. The default behavior of lookup is to return a string of comma separated values. lookup can be explicitly configured to return a list using wantlist=True.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.5中，添加了一个名为 query 的新Jinja2函数来调用查找插件。 lookup 和 query 之间的区别主要在于 query 将始终返回列表。 lookup 的默认行为是返回由逗号分隔的值的字符串。可以显式配置 lookup 以使用 wantlist=True 返回列表。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.5, a new jinja2 function called query was added for invoking lookup plugins. The difference between lookup and query is largely that query will always return a list. The default behavior of lookup is to return a string of comma separated values. lookup can be explicitly configured to return a list using wantlist=True.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.5中，添加了一个名为 query 的新jinja2函数来调用查找插件。 lookup 和 query 之间的区别主要在于 query 将始终返回列表。 lookup 的默认行为是返回由逗号分隔的值的字符串。可以显式配置 lookup 以使用 wantlist=True 返回列表。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7 a new module argument named public was added to the include_role module that dictates whether or not the role’s defaults and vars will be exposed outside of the role, allowing those variables to be used by later tasks. This value defaults to public: False, matching current behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7中，将一个名为 public 的新模块参数添加到 include_role 模块中，该参数指示角色的 defaults 和 vars 是否将在角色之外公开，从而允许这些变量供以后的任务使用。此值默认为 public: False ，匹配当前行为。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7 and earlier, when: double_interpolated evaluated to the value of bare_variable, in this case, False. If the variable bare_variable is undefined, the conditional fails.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7和更早版本中， when: double_interpolated 计算结果为 bare_variable 的值，在这种情况下为 False 。如果未定义变量 bare_variable ，则条件条件失败。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7 and earlier, Ansible defaulted to /usr/bin/python as the setting for ansible_python_interpreter. If you ran Ansible against a system that installed Python with a different name or a different path, your playbooks would fail with /usr/bin/python: bad interpreter: No such file or directory unless you either set ansible_python_interpreter to the correct value for that system or added a Python interpreter and any necessary dependencies at usr/bin/python.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7和更早版本中，Ansible默认为/ usr / bin / python作为 ansible_python_interpreter 的设置。如果在安装了其他名称或路径的Python的系统上运行Ansible，则您的剧本将失败，并带有 /usr/bin/python: bad interpreter: No such file or directory 除非您将 ansible_python_interpreter 设置为正确的值系统，或在usr / bin / python中添加了Python解释器和任何必要的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7 and earlier, both conditions evaluated as False if teardown: 'false'
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7及更早版本中，如果 teardown: 'false' ，则两个条件均评估为 False ：'false'

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7 and earlier, the two conditions above evaluated as True and False respectively if teardown: 'true'
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7和更早版本中，如果 teardown: 'true' ，上述两个条件分别评估为 True 和 False ：'true'

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7 and earlier, top-level variables sometimes treated boolean strings as if they were boolean values. This led to inconsistent behavior in conditional tests built on top-level variables defined as strings. Ansible 2.8 began changing this behavior. For example, if you set two conditions like this:
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7和更早的版本中,顶层变量有时会将布尔字符串当作布尔值处理。这导致在基于定义为字符串的顶层变量构建的条件测试中出现不一致的行为。Ansible 2.8开始改变这种行为。例如,如果你设置了这样的两个条件。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7 and older:
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7及以上版本中。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.7, role vars and defaults are now parsed before tasks/main.yml. This can cause a change in behavior if the same variable is defined at the play level and the role level with different values, and leveraged in import_tasks or import_role to define the role or file to import.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.7中，现在在 tasks/main.yml 之前解析角色 vars 和 defaults 。如果在播放级别和角色级别使用不同的值定义了相同的变量，并在 import_tasks 或 import_role 中利用它来定义要导入的角色或文件，则可能会导致行为发生变化。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.8 and later, with bare variables disabled, Ansible evaluates double_interpolated as the string 'bare_variable', which is True.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.8及更高版本，裸变量禁用，Ansible评估板 double_interpolated 为字符串 'bare_variable' ，这是 True 。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.8 and later, you have the option of disabling conditional bare variables, so when: teardown always evaluates as True and when: not teardown always evaluates as False when teardown is a non-empty string (including 'true' or 'false')
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.8和更高版本中，您可以选择禁用条件裸变量，因此 when: teardown 当 teardown 是非空字符串（包括 'true' 或 'false' )时，when：teardown的求值始终为 True ,而 when: not teardown 求值始终为 False 。）

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.8 the implicit “Gathering Facts” task in a play was changed to obey play tags. Previous to 2.8, the “Gathering Facts” task would ignore play tags and tags supplied from the command line and always run in a task.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.8中，将剧本中的隐式“收集事实”任务更改为服从剧本标签。在2.8之前的版本中，“收集事实”任务将忽略播放标签和从命令行提供的标签，并且始终在任务中运行。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.8, retry_files_enabled now defaults to False instead of True. The behavior can be modified to previous version by editing the default ansible.cfg file and setting the value to True.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.8中， retry_files_enabled 现在默认为 False 而不是 True 。通过编辑默认的 ansible.cfg 文件并将其值设置为 True ,可以将该行为修改为以前的版本。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.8, if you supply --tags nginx, the implicit “Gathering Facts” task will be skipped, as the task now inherits the tag of webserver instead of always.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.8中，如果提供 --tags nginx ，则将跳过隐式的“收集事实”任务，因为该任务现在继承了 webserver 的标签，而不是 always 继承。

trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.8中。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.9 and later, the ansible.netcommon.network_cli connection plugin configuration option is added to control the number of attempts to connect to a remote host. The default number of attempts is three. After every retry attempt the delay between retries is increased by power of 2 in seconds until either the maximum attempts are exhausted or either the persistent_command_timeout or persistent_connect_timeout timers are triggered.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.9和更高版本中，添加了 ansible.netcommon.network_cli 连接插件配置选项，以控制尝试连接到远程主机的次数。默认尝试次数为三。每次重试尝试后，重试之间的延迟都会增加2的幂（以秒为单位），直到最大尝试次数用完或触发 persistent_command_timeout 或 persistent_connect_timeout 计时器为止。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.9 and later, the ansible.netcommon.network_cli connection plugin configuration options are added to handle the stdout and stderr regex to identify if the command execution response consist of a normal response or an error response. These options can be set group/host variables or as tasks variables.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.9和更高版本中，添加了 ansible.netcommon.network_cli 连接插件配置选项以处理stdout和stderr regex，以识别命令执行响应是正常响应还是错误响应。这些选项可以设置为组/主机变量，也可以设置为任务变量。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.9 and later, the network_cli connection plugin configuration option is added to control the number of attempts to connect to a remote host. The default number of attempts is three. After every retry attempt the delay between retries is increased by power of 2 in seconds until either the maximum attempts are exhausted or either the persistent_command_timeout or persistent_connect_timeout timers are triggered.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.9和更高版本中，添加了 network_cli 连接插件配置选项以控制尝试连接到远程主机的次数。默认尝试次数为三。每次重试尝试后，重试之间的延迟都会增加2的幂（以秒为单位），直到最大尝试次数用完或触发 persistent_command_timeout 或 persistent_connect_timeout 计时器为止。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.9 and later, the network_cli connection plugin configuration options are added to handle the platform specific login menu. These options can be set as group/host or tasks variables.

trans-unit.source: In Ansible 2.9 and later, the network_cli connection plugin configuration options are added to handle the stdout and stderr regex to identify if the command execution response consist of a normal response or an error response. These options can be set group/host variables or as tasks variables.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.9及以后的版本中,增加了network_cli连接插件配置选项来处理stdout和stderr regex,以识别命令执行响应是由正常响应还是错误响应组成。这些选项可以设置组/主机变量或作为任务变量。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible version 2.4, the concept of dynamic includes (include_tasks) versus static imports (import_tasks) was introduced to clearly define the differences in how include works between dynamic and static includes.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible 2.4版中，引入了动态包含（ include_tasks ）与静态导入（ import_tasks ）的概念，以明确定义动态包含和静态包含之间的 include 方式差异。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible versions 2.4 and older, after creating a GitHub release using the create_release state, the github_release module reported state as skipped. In Ansible version 2.5 and later, after creating a GitHub release using the create_release state, the github_release module now reports state as changed.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4和更早版本的 create_release ，使用create_release状态创建GitHub版本后， github_release 模块报告状态为 skipped 。在Ansible版本2.5及更高版本，使用创造了GitHub的释放后 create_release 状态时， github_release 模块现在作为报告状态 changed 。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible versions prior to 2.4, the inventory system would maintain the context of the initial playbook that was executed. This allowed successively included playbooks from other directories to inherit group_vars and host_vars placed relative to the top level playbook file.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4之前的Ansible版本中,清单系统将维护被执行的初始playbook的上下文,这允许从其他目录中连续包含的playbook继承相对于顶层playbook文件的group_vars和host_vars。这允许来自其他目录的连续包含的playbook继承相对于顶层playbook文件放置的group_vars和host_vars。

trans-unit.source: In Ansible-2.5.3, the template module became more strict about its src file being proper utf-8. Previously, non-utf8 contents in a template module src file would result in a mangled output file (the non-utf8 characters would be replaced with a unicode replacement character). Now, on Python2, the module will error out with the message, “Template source files must be utf-8 encoded”. On Python3, the module will first attempt to pass the non-utf8 characters through verbatim and fail if that does not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 在Ansible-2.5.3中，模板模块对其 src 文件正确的utf-8 变得更加严格。以前，模板模块src文件中的非utf8内容将导致输出文件损坏（非utf8字符将替换为unicode替换字符）。现在，在Python2上，该模块将错误提示“模板源文件必须为utf-8编码”。在Python3上，该模块将首先尝试逐字传递非utf8字符，如果未成功则失败。

trans-unit.source: In Python2, dictionaries have iterkeys(), itervalues(), and iteritems() methods. These methods have been removed in Python3. Playbooks and Jinja2 templates should use dict.keys(), dict.values(), and dict.items() in order to be compatible with both Python2 and Python3:

trans-unit.source: In Python2, the dict.keys(), dict.values(), and dict.items() methods returns a list. Jinja2 returns that to Ansible via a string representation that Ansible can turn back into a list. In Python3, those methods return a dictionary view object. The string representation that Jinja2 returns for dictionary views cannot be parsed back into a list by Ansible. It is, however, easy to make this portable by using the list filter whenever using dict.keys(), dict.values(), or dict.items():

trans-unit.source: In a playbook, you can control the collections Ansible searches for modules and action plugins to execute. However, any roles you call in your playbook define their own collections search order; they do not inherit the calling playbook’s settings. This is true even if the role does not define its own collections keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在剧本中，您可以控制集合Ansible搜索要执行的模块和动作插件。但是，您在剧本中调用的任何角色都定义了自己的收藏搜索顺序；它们不会继承调用剧本的设置。即使角色没有定义自己的 collections 关键字，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: In a playbook, you can set module defaults for whole groups of modules, such as setting a common AWS region.
trans-unit.target: 在一个剧本中,你可以为整组模块设置模块默认值,比如设置一个共同的AWS区域。

trans-unit.source: In a playbook, you may want to execute different tasks, or have different goals, depending on the value of a fact (data about the remote system), a variable, or the result of a previous task. You may want the value of some variables to depend on the value of other variables. Or you may want to create additional groups of hosts based on whether the hosts match other criteria. You can do all of these things with conditionals.
trans-unit.target: 在演算簿中,您可能希望根据事实(关于远程系统的数据)、变量或前一个任务的结果的值来执行不同的任务,或有不同的目标。您可能希望一些变量的值取决于其他变量的值。或者您可能希望根据主机是否符合其他标准来创建其他的主机组。您可以使用条件来完成所有这些事情。

trans-unit.source: In a playbook:
trans-unit.target: 在一个剧本里。

trans-unit.source: In a resource pool with an expandable reservation, the reservation on a resource pool can grow beyond the specified value.

trans-unit.source: In a rolling fashion, replace all instances that used the old launch configuration with one from the new launch configuration. It increases the ASG size by replace_batch_size, waits for the new instances to be up and running. After that, it terminates a batch of old instances, waits for the replacements, and repeats, until all old instances are replaced. Once that's done the ASG size is reduced back to the expected size.
trans-unit.target: 以滚动方式，将所有使用旧启动配置的实例替换为新启动配置中的一个。它通过 replace_batch_size 增加ASG大小，等待新实例启动并运行。之后，它将终止一批旧实例，等待替换，然后重复，直到所有旧实例都被替换为止。完成后，ASG大小将减小到预期大小。

trans-unit.source: In a rolling fashion, replace all instances that used the old launch configuration with one from the new launch configuration. It increases the ASG size by replace_batch_size, waits for the new instances to be up and running. After that, it terminates a batch of old instances, waits for the replacements, and repeats, until all old instances are replaced. Once that's done the ASG size is reduced back to the expected size.
trans-unit.target: 以滚动方式，将所有使用旧启动配置的实例替换为新启动配置中的一个。它通过replace_batch_size增加ASG大小，等待新实例启动并运行。之后，它将终止一批旧实例，等待替换，然后重复，直到所有旧实例都被替换为止。完成后，ASG大小将减小到预期大小。

trans-unit.source: In addition to strategies, several keywords also affect play execution. You can set a number, a percentage, or a list of numbers of hosts you want to manage at a time with serial. Ansible completes the play on the specified number or percentage of hosts before starting the next batch of hosts. You can restrict the number of workers allotted to a block or task with throttle. You can control how Ansible selects the next host in a group to execute against with order. You can run a task on a single host with run_once. These keywords are not strategies. They are directives or options applied to a play, block, or task.
trans-unit.target: 除了策略外，几个关键字还影响播放执行。您可以使用 serial 一次设置要管理的主机的数量，百分比或数量列表。在开始下一批主机之前，Ansible在指定数量或百分比的主机上完成播放。您可以限制分配给一个块或任务与工人的数量 throttle 。您可以控制Ansible如何选择组中要按 order 执行的下一个主机。您可以使用 run_once 在单个主机上运行任务。这些关键字不是策略。它们是应用于播放，块或任务的指令或选项。

trans-unit.source: In ansible-1.9.x, you would generally copy an existing plugin to create a new one. Simply implementing the methods and attributes that the caller of the plugin expected made it a plugin of that type. In ansible-2.0, most plugins are implemented by subclassing a base class for each plugin type. This way the custom plugin does not need to contain methods which are not customized.
trans-unit.target: 在ansible-1.9.x中,你一般会复制一个现有的插件来创建一个新的插件。只要实现插件的调用者所期望的方法和属性,就可以使它成为该类型的插件。在ansible-2.0中,大多数插件是通过为每个插件类型子类实现的。这样定制的插件就不需要包含非定制的方法。

trans-unit.source: In case a parent id is provided from a previous task, it might be empty and if a search is possible on root, it will do so, which can impact performance.

trans-unit.source: In case if single play use blocks management module few times it is preferred to enabled 'caching' by making previous module to share gathered artifacts and pass them to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果单次使用区块管理模块的次数较多,最好启用 "缓存",使以前的模块共享收集到的工件,并将它们传递给这个参数。

trans-unit.source: In case of 'present' state should wait for EFS 'available' life cycle state (of course, if current state not 'deleting' or 'deleted') In case of 'absent' state should wait for EFS 'deleted' life cycle state
trans-unit.target: 在'存在'状态的情况下,应该等待EFS'可用'的生命周期状态(当然,如果当前状态不是'删除'或'删除')在'不存在'状态的情况下,应该等待EFS'删除'的生命周期状态。

trans-unit.target: 在 state=absent 的情况下，地址族配置将不存在。因此，将忽略选项 route_target_both_auto_evpn 和 route_targets 。

trans-unit.source: In case of text format of the configuration should be supported by remote Netconf server.
trans-unit.target: 如果是文本格式，则远程Netconf服务器应支持该配置。

trans-unit.target: 如果是Windows VM，请将 ansible_shell_type 设置为 powershell 。

trans-unit.target: 如果发生ZAPI错误，请设置 status ， errno ， reason 来帮助诊断问题，

trans-unit.source: In case of delete the existing BGP configuration will be removed from the device.
trans-unit.target: 在删除的情况下,现有的BGP配置将从设备中删除。

trans-unit.source: In case of json string format it will be converted to the corresponding xml string using xmltodict library before pushing onto the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果是json字符串格式,它将在推送到远程主机之前,使用xmltodict库转换为相应的xml字符串。

trans-unit.source: In case of merge, the input configuration will be merged with the existing BGP configuration on the device.
trans-unit.target: 在合并的情况下,输入的配置将与设备上现有的BGP配置合并。

trans-unit.source: In case of multiple VMs with same name, use uuid to uniquely specify VM to manage.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个具有相同名称的VM，请使用 uuid 唯一地指定要管理的VM。

trans-unit.source: In case of multiple network attached to virtual machine, define which interface should be returned as primary IP address.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个网络连接到虚拟机上,定义哪个接口应该作为主IP地址返回。

trans-unit.source: In case of multiple templates/VMs/snapshots with same name, use template_uuid to uniquely specify source template.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个相同名称的模板/ VM /快照，请使用 template_uuid 唯一指定源模板。

trans-unit.source: In case of override, all the existing BGP configuration will be removed from the device and replaced with the input configuration.
trans-unit.target: 在覆盖的情况下,所有现有的BGP配置将被从设备中移除,并替换为输入的配置。

trans-unit.source: In case of replace, if there is a diff between the existing configuration and the input configuration, the existing configuration will be replaced by the input configuration for every option that has the diff.
trans-unit.target: 在替换的情况下,如果现有的配置和输入配置之间有差异,现有的配置将被输入配置替换为每个有差异的选项。

trans-unit.source: In case of success, a json dictionary is returned as response.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，则返回json字典作为 response 。

trans-unit.source: In case of timeout, module will generate an error message.
trans-unit.target: 在超时的情况下,模块会产生一个错误信息。

trans-unit.source: In case state=absent and Hook exists, will delete it.
trans-unit.target: 如果state=absent且Hook存在,将删除它。

trans-unit.source: In case the CSR signature cannot be validated, the module will fail. In this case, all return variables are still returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果CSR签名不能被验证,该模块将失败。在这种情况下,所有的返回变量仍然会被返回。

trans-unit.source: In case the check returns no, the module will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查返回 no ，则模块将失败。

trans-unit.source: In case the key consistency checks fail, the module will fail as this indicates a faked private key. In this case, all return variables are still returned. Note that key consistency checks are not available all key types; if none is available, none is returned for key_is_consistent.
trans-unit.target: 万一密钥一致性检查失败，模块将失败，因为这表明伪造的私钥。在这种情况下，所有返回变量仍将返回。注意，密钥一致性检查并非对所有密钥类型都可用；如果没有可用的，则 none 为 key_is_consistent 返回任何内容。

trans-unit.source: In case the language can’t be deleted because it is required by the database system, you can specify fail_on_drop=no to ignore the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于数据库系统需要而无法删除该语言，则可以指定fail_on_drop = no来忽略该错误。

trans-unit.source: In case the master instance fails, the replica instance will be promoted as the new master instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果主实例失败,副本实例将被提升为新的主实例。

trans-unit.source: In case the ssh key is broken or password protected, the module will fail. Set the force option to yes if you want to regenerate the keypair.
trans-unit.target: 如果ssh密钥损坏或受密码保护，则该模块将失败。如果要重新生成密钥对，请将force选项设置为 yes 。

trans-unit.source: In case where 'failoverRatio' is not set or all the VMs in the backup backend are unhealthy, the traffic will be directed back to the primary backend in the "force" mode, where traffic will be spread to the healthy VMs with the best effort, or to all VMs when no VM is healthy.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置'failoverRatio',或者备份后端所有的虚拟机都不健康,那么在 "强制 "模式下,流量将被引导回主后端,在主后端,流量将被尽力分散到健康的虚拟机上,或者在没有虚拟机健康时,将流量分散到所有的虚拟机上。

trans-unit.source: In case where failoverRatio and backupPool are not set, or all the instances in the backup pool are unhealthy, the traffic will be directed back to the primary pool in the "force" mode, where traffic will be spread to the healthy instances with the best effort, or to all instances when no instance is healthy.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置failoverRatio和backupPool,或者备份池中的所有实例都不健康,那么流量将以 "强制 "模式被引导回主池,在主池中,流量将被尽力分散到健康的实例上,或者在没有实例健康时,将流量分散到所有实例上。

trans-unit.source: In case where failoverRatio is not set or all the instances in the backup pool are unhealthy, the traffic will be directed back to the primary pool in the "force" mode, where traffic will be spread to the healthy instances with the best effort, or to all instances when no instance is healthy.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置failoverRatio,或者备份池中的所有实例都不健康,那么流量将以 "强制 "模式被引导回主池,在主池中,流量将以最大的努力分散到健康的实例,或者在没有实例健康的情况下分散到所有实例。

trans-unit.target: 如果你需要指定更多的参数,你可以使用以下语法。

trans-unit.source: In case you receive this error while you are certain your aci_rest payload and object classes are seemingly correct, the issue might be that your payload is not in fact correct JSON (e.g. the sent payload is using single quotes, rather than double quotes), and as a result the APIC is not correctly parsing your object classes from the payload. One way to avoid this is by using a YAML or an XML formatted payload, which are easier to construct correctly and modify later.
trans-unit.target: 如果在确定aci_rest有效载荷和对象类似乎正确的同时收到此错误，则问题可能是您的有效载荷实际上不是正确的JSON（例如，发送的有效载荷使用单引号而不是双引号），并且因此，APIC无法正确地从有效负载中解析您的对象类。避免这种情况的一种方法是使用YAML或XML格式的有效负载，它们更容易正确构造并在以后进行修改。

trans-unit.source: In case you receive this error while you are certain your aci_rest payload and object classes are seemingly correct, the issue might be that your payload is not in fact correct JSON (for example, the sent payload is using single quotes, rather than double quotes), and as a result the APIC is not correctly parsing your object classes from the payload. One way to avoid this is by using a YAML or an XML formatted payload, which are easier to construct correctly and modify later.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到这个错误,而你确定你的aci_rest有效载荷和对象类似乎是正确的,问题可能是你的有效载荷实际上不是正确的JSON(例如,发送的有效载荷使用的是单引号,而不是双引号),因此APIC没有正确地从有效载荷中解析你的对象类。避免这种情况的方法之一是使用YAML或XML格式的payload,这样更容易正确构造和以后修改。

trans-unit.source: In case, vs is idle for a period of time as specified by ondemand_metrics_idle_timeout then metrics processing is suspended for that vs.
trans-unit.target: 如果vs在ondemand_metrics_idle_timeout指定的一段时间内处于空闲状态,那么该vs的指标处理将被暂停。

trans-unit.source: In cases where multiple network interfaces are present, this refers to the eth0 device (the device for which the device number is 0).
trans-unit.target: 在存在多个网络接口的情况下,指的是eth0设备(设备号为0的设备)。

trans-unit.source: In cases where there is no appropriate module available for a task, a command or script can be run using the win_shell, win_command, raw, and script modules.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有适用于任务的模块，则可以使用 win_shell ， win_command ， raw 和 script 模块运行命令或脚本。

trans-unit.target: 在某些部署中,接受流量可能会有额外的延迟。

trans-unit.source: In check mode, the module will indicate if an upgrade is needed and whether or not the upgrade is disruptive or non-disruptive(ISSU).
trans-unit.target: 在检查模式下,模块将指示是否需要升级,以及升级是否具有破坏性或非破坏性(ISSU)。

trans-unit.source: In combination with command=find, it will only return the single entity.
trans-unit.target: 与command = find结合使用，它将仅返回单个实体。

trans-unit.source: In combination with state, it will either update or delete this entity.
trans-unit.target: 与state结合使用，它将更新或删除此实体。

trans-unit.source: In compact placement, virtual services are placed on existing ses until max_vs_per_se limit is reached.
trans-unit.target: 在紧凑布局中,虚拟服务被放置在现有的 ses 上,直到达到 max_vs_per_se 限制。

trans-unit.source: In complete mode resources are deployed and existing resources in the resource group not included in the template are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 在完整模式下部署资源,并删除模板中未包含的资源组中的现有资源。

trans-unit.source: In compliance with browser requirements, this certificate may be posted to the Certificate Transparency (CT) logs. This is a best practice technique that helps domain owners monitor certificates issued to their domains. Note that not all certificates are eligible for CT logging.
trans-unit.target: 根据浏览器的要求,该证书可能会被发布到证书透明度(CT)日志中。这是一种最佳实践技术,可以帮助域名所有者监控发给他们域名的证书。请注意,并不是所有的证书都有资格进行CT记录。

trans-unit.source: In current embodiments, this feature is in beta-level state and the Redis plugin does not support port or password configuration, this is expected to change in the near future.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的情况下,该功能处于测试级状态,Redis插件不支持端口或密码配置,预计在不久的将来,这一情况会有所改变。

trans-unit.source: In development (2.10 unreleased, trunk)
trans-unit.target: 开发中(2.10未发布,主干)

trans-unit.source: In fresh start all the configs are downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 在重新启动时,所有的配置都会被下载。

trans-unit.source: In general default rules will not be modified. Modify rules to shape the flow of traffic to or from a subnet or NIC.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下,默认规则不会被修改。修改规则,以形成流向或来自子网或 NIC 的流量。

trans-unit.source: In general the device-group with the 'worst' sync-status will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,同步状态 "最差 "的设备组会被显示出来。

trans-unit.source: In general, Ansible gives precedence to variables that were defined more recently, more actively, and with more explicit scope. Variables in the the defaults folder inside a role are easily overridden. Anything in the vars directory of the role overrides previous versions of that variable in the namespace. Host and/or inventory variables override role defaults, but explicit includes such as the vars directory or an include_vars task override inventory variables.
trans-unit.target: 通常，Ansible优先使用最近定义，更活跃且定义范围更广的变量。角色内默认文件夹中的变量很容易被覆盖。角色的vars目录中的所有内容都会覆盖名称空间中该变量的先前版本。主机和/或清单变量覆盖角色默认值，但显式包含（例如vars目录）或 include_vars 任务覆盖清单变量。

trans-unit.source: In general, content you encrypt with Ansible Vault remains encrypted after execution. However, there is one exception. If you pass an encrypted file as the src argument to the copy, template, unarchive, script or assemble module, the file will not be encrypted on the target host (assuming you supply the correct vault password when you run the play). This behavior is intended and useful. You can encrypt a configuration file or template to avoid sharing the details of your configuration, but when you copy that configuration to servers in your environment, you want it to be decrypted so local users and processes can access it.
trans-unit.target: 通常，使用Ansible Vault加密的内容在执行后仍保持加密状态。但是，有一个例外。如果将加密文件作为 src 参数传递给copy，template，unarchive，script或assemble模块，则该文件将不会在目标主机上加密（假设在运行播放时提供了正确的Vault密码）。此行为是有意的和有用的。您可以对配置文件或模板进行加密，以避免共享配置的详细信息，但是在将该配置复制到环境中的服务器时，您希望对其进行解密，以便本地用户和进程可以访问它。

trans-unit.source: In general, the default thread configuration should be used.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,应该使用默认的线程配置。

trans-unit.source: In incremental mode, resources are deployed without deleting existing resources that are not included in the template.
trans-unit.target: 在增量模式下,资源的部署不会删除模板中未包含的现有资源。

trans-unit.source: In its simplest form, the dig lookup plugin can be used to retrieve an IPv4 address (DNS A record) associated with FQDN
trans-unit.target: 最简单的形式,dig lookup插件可以用来检索与FQDN相关联的IPv4地址(DNS A记录)。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, loop syntax is better expressed using filters instead of more complex use of query or lookup.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，使用过滤器更好地表达 loop 语法，而不是更复杂地使用 query 或 lookup 。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, you need to do some complex operation with your variables, while Ansible is not recommended as a data processing/manipulation tool, you can use the existing Jinja2 templating in conjunction with the many added Ansible filters, lookups and tests to do some very complex transformations.
trans-unit.target: 在很多情况下,你需要对你的变量进行一些复杂的操作,虽然不建议将Ansible作为数据处理/操作工具,但你可以使用现有的Jinja2模板,结合许多新增的Ansible过滤器、查找和测试来进行一些非常复杂的转换。

trans-unit.source: In merge mode existing categories are kept or updated, new categories are added.
trans-unit.target: 在合并模式下,现有的类别被保留或更新,新的类别被添加。

trans-unit.source: In merge mode existing settings are merged with the supplied belongsto_filters.
trans-unit.target: 在合并模式下，现有设置与提供的 belongsto_filters 合并。

trans-unit.source: In more recent versions we do not restrict the method at the module level anymore but it still must be a valid method accepted by the service handling the request.
trans-unit.target: 在最近的版本中,我们不再限制模块级别的方法,但它仍然必须是处理请求的服务所接受的有效方法。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, leave this enabled unless it causes problems.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下,除非会引起问题,否则不要启用这个功能。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, loops work best with the loop keyword instead of with_X style loops. The loop syntax is usually best expressed using filters instead of more complex use of query or lookup.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，循环最好使用 loop 关键字而不是 with_X 样式循环。该 loop 语法通常最好是使用，而不是更复杂的使用过滤器表达 query 或 lookup 。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, packages installed with apt will start newly installed services by default. Most distributions have mechanisms to avoid this. For example when installing Postgresql-9.5 in Debian 9, creating an excutable shell script (/usr/sbin/policy-rc.d) that throws a return code of 101 will stop Postgresql 9.5 starting up after install. Remove the file or remove its execute permission afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下,使用apt安装的软件包会默认启动新安装的服务。大多数发行版都有机制来避免这种情况。例如,当在Debian 9中安装Postgresql-9.5时,创建一个可excutable shell脚本(/usr/sbin/policy-rc.d),抛出一个101的返回代码,将在安装后停止Postgresql 9.5的启动。之后请删除该文件或取消其执行权限。

trans-unit.source: In most languages it is easy to create a dictionary (a.k.a. map/associative array/hash and so on) from a list of pairs, in Ansible there are a couple of ways to do it and the best one for you might depend on the source of your data.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数语言中,很容易从一个对的列表中创建一个字典(也就是map/关联数组/hash等),在Ansible中,有几种方法可以做到这一点,对你来说最好的方法可能取决于你的数据来源。

trans-unit.source: In multiple-interface environments, an interface can be attached by a third party, such as Elastic Load Balancing.
trans-unit.target: 在多接口环境下,可以由第三方附加一个接口,如弹性负载均衡。

trans-unit.target: 在openshift/kubernetes环境中,应用元数据信息被存储。

trans-unit.target: 在openshift/kubernetes环境中,出口pod信息被存储。

trans-unit.target: 在openstack或aws云中,当选择auto_allocate_floating_ip时,它是必需的。

trans-unit.source: In order for a package to take effect, the remote device must be restarted. trans-unit.target: 为了使软件包生效,必须重新启动远程设备。当启用时,该参数将指示模块在安装了更新包后重新启动设备。如果禁用,或者不需要更改远程软件包,则设备不会被启动。

trans-unit.source: In order for custom stats to be displayed, you must set show_custom_stats in ansible.cfg or ANSIBLE_SHOW_CUSTOM_STATS to yes.
trans-unit.target: 在要显示的顺序为自定义统计，你必须设置 show_custom_stats 在 ansible.cfg 或 ANSIBLE_SHOW_CUSTOM_STATS 来 yes 。

trans-unit.target: 为了使其发挥作用,设备组中的所有设备必须首先同意配置。通常情况下,这需要至少对每个设备进行一次完整的配置加载。

trans-unit.target: 为了更改VM的参数（例如，CPU数量），除非已启用热添加支持并且必须使用 state=present 来应用更改，否则必须关闭VM电源。

trans-unit.source: In practice, you might even end up mixing all these setups as you might need to, on one day, update all nodes in a specific data center while, on another day, update all the application servers no matter their location.
trans-unit.target: 在实践中,你甚至可能最终会混合所有这些设置,因为你可能需要在某一天更新特定数据中心的所有节点,而在另一天更新所有应用服务器,无论其位置如何。

trans-unit.source: In pull mode the remote host in context is the source.
trans-unit.target: 在拉模式下,上下文中的远程主机是源头。

trans-unit.source: In push mode the localhost or delegate is the source.
trans-unit.target: 在推送模式下,本地主机或委托人是源。

trans-unit.source: In replace mode all categories will be replaced with the supplied managed_filters.
trans-unit.target: 在替换模式下，所有类别都将由提供的 managed_filters 替换。

trans-unit.source: In replace mode current values are replaced with the supplied belongsto_filters.
trans-unit.target: 在替换模式下，当前值将替换为提供的 belongsto_filters 。

trans-unit.source: In response to a matching matchRule, the load balancer performs advanced routing actions like URL rewrites, header transformations, etc. prior to forwarding the request to the selected backend. If routeAction specifies any weightedBackendServices, service must not be set. Conversely if service is set, routeAction cannot contain any weightedBackendServices. Only one of routeAction or urlRedirect must be set.
trans-unit.target: 为了响应匹配的matchRule,负载均衡器在将请求转发到选定的后端之前,会执行高级路由操作,如URL重写、头转换等。如果routeAction指定了任何加权后端服务,则必须不设置service。反之如果设置了service,则routeAction不能包含任何加权后端服务。在routeAction和urlRedirect中只能设置一个。

trans-unit.source: In response to a matching path, the load balancer performs advanced routing actions like URL rewrites, header transformations, etc. prior to forwarding the request to the selected backend. If routeAction specifies any weightedBackendServices, service must not be set. Conversely if service is set, routeAction cannot contain any weightedBackendServices. Only one of routeAction or urlRedirect must be set.
trans-unit.target: 作为对匹配路径的响应,负载均衡器在将请求转发到选定的后端之前,会执行高级路由操作,如URL重写、头转换等。如果routeAction指定了任何加权后端服务,则不得设置service。反之如果设置了service,则routeAction不能包含任何加权后端服务。在routeAction和urlRedirect中只能设置一个。

trans-unit.source: In response to a preflight request, setting this to true indicates that the actual request can include user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 在响应飞行前请求时,将此设置为 "true "表示实际请求可以包含用户凭证。

trans-unit.source: In response to a preflight request, setting this to true indicates that the actual request can include user credentials. This translates to the Access- Control-Allow-Credentials header. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 在响应飞行前请求时,将此设置为 "true "表示实际请求可以包含用户凭证。这相当于访问控制-允许-凭证头。默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: In seconds, how long before a request sent to a backend is considered failed.
trans-unit.target: 以秒为单位,发送至后端的请求多久会被视为失败。

trans-unit.source: In seconds, set a container-wide TTL for all objects cached on CDN edge nodes. Setting a TTL is only appropriate for containers that are public
trans-unit.target: 秒,为CDN边缘节点上缓存的所有对象设置一个容器范围的TTL。设置TTL仅适用于属于公共的容器。

trans-unit.target: 在site.yml中，我们导入一本定义整个基础架构的剧本。这是一个非常简短的示例，因为它只是导入其他一些剧本：

trans-unit.source: In some cases for local connections the login_unix_socket=/path/to/mysqld/socket, that is usually /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock, needs to be used instead of login_host=localhost.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，对于本地连接，需要使用login_unix_socket = / path / to / mysqld / socket（通常为 /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock ）来代替login_host = localhost。

trans-unit.source: In some cases there may be a need to only run a task one time for a batch of hosts. This can be achieved by configuring “run_once” on a task:
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，可能只需要为一批主机运行一次任务。这可以通过在任务上配置“ run_once”来实现：

trans-unit.source: In some cases, it is not possible to remove a language (used by the db-system).
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,不可能删除一种语言(由db系统使用)。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, for example, if the inventory plugin does not use a YAML configuration file, you may need to enable the specific plugin. You can do this by setting enable_plugins in your ansible.cfg file in the [inventory] section. Modifying this will override the default list of enabled plugins. Here is the default list of enabled plugins that ships with Ansible:
trans-unit.target: 例如，在某些情况下，如果清单插件不使用YAML配置文件，则可能需要启用特定的插件。您可以通过在 [inventory] 部分的ansible.cfg文件中设置 enable_plugins 来实现。修改此设置将覆盖已启用插件的默认列表。这是Ansible随附的已启用插件的默认列表：

trans-unit.source: In specific cases you may want a plugin that supports both ansible-1.9.x and ansible-2.0. Much like porting plugins from v1 to v2, you need to understand how plugins work in each version and support both requirements.
trans-unit.target: 在特定情况下，您可能需要同时支持ansible-1.9.x 和 ansible-2.0 的插件。就像将插件从v1移植到v2一样，您需要了解插件在每个版本中的工作方式并支持这两个要求。

trans-unit.source: In such a case, avi members can have controller derived status while non-avi members can be probed by via health monitor probes in dataplane.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,avi成员可以有控制器派生的状态,而非avi成员可以通过数据机中的健康监控探头进行探测。

trans-unit.source: In such a situation, if the module tries to remove the schema it will fail and only remove roles created for the schema if they have no dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,如果模块试图删除模式,就会失败,只有在没有依赖关系的情况下才会删除为模式创建的角色。

trans-unit.source: In such a situation, if the module tries to remove the user it will fail and only remove roles granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,如果模块试图删除用户,就会失败,只能删除授予该用户的角色。

trans-unit.source: In the nxos_igmp_interface module, oif_prefix and oif_source properties are deprecated. Use ois_ps parameter with a dictionary of prefix and source to values instead.
trans-unit.target: 在nxos_igmp_interface模块中，不赞成使用 oif_prefix 和 oif_source 属性。请使用带有前缀字典和值的源字典的 ois_ps 参数。

trans-unit.source: In the ['_meta']['hostvars'] key, there is a list of devices (uniquely identified by their public IPv4 address) with their parameters. The other keys under ['_meta'] are lists of devices grouped by some parameter. Here, it is type (all devices are of type baremetal_0), operating system, and facility (ewr1 and sjc1).
trans-unit.target: 在 ['_meta']['hostvars'] 键中，有一个带有参数的设备列表（由其公共IPv4地址唯一标识）。 ['_meta'] 下的其他键是按某个参数分组的设备列表。在这里，它是类型（所有设备的类型都是裸金属_0），操作系统和设备（ewr1和sjc1）。

trans-unit.source: In the vars file, define all of the variables needed, including any sensitive ones.
trans-unit.target: 在 vars 文件中，定义所需的所有变量，包括任何敏感变量。

trans-unit.source: In the above case, the ‘dev’ password will be tried first, then the ‘prod’ password for cases where Ansible doesn’t know which vault ID is used to encrypt something.
trans-unit.target: 在上述情况下，将首先尝试使用“开发”密码，然后在Ansible不知道使用哪个库ID加密某些内容的情况下，再尝试使用“产品”密码。

trans-unit.source: In the above example any queued up handlers would be processed early when the meta statement was reached. This is a bit of a niche case but can come in handy from time to time.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，任何到达队列的处理程序都将在到达 meta 语句时及早处理。这是一个小众案例，但有时会派上用场。

trans-unit.source: In the above example task, the command show interface Ethernet4 | json is executed on the remote device and the results are evaluated. If the path (result[0].interfaces.Ethernet4.interfaceStatus) is not equal to “connected”, then the command is retried. This process continues until either the condition is satisfied or the number of retries has expired (by default, this is 10 retries at 1 second intervals).
trans-unit.target: 在上述示例任务中，命令 show interface Ethernet4 | json 在远程设备上执行json并评估结果。如果路径 (result[0].interfaces.Ethernet4.interfaceStatus) 不等于“ connected”，则重试该命令。此过程将一直持续到满足条件或重试次数到期（默认情况下，每1秒间隔10次重试）。

trans-unit.source: In the above example we did not use the warning() method as we had no direct use for it in the final version. However we left this code in so people can use this part during development/porting/use.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，我们没有使用 warning() 方法，因为在最终版本中我们没有直接使用它。但是，我们保留了此代码，因此人们可以在开发/移植/使用过程中使用此部分。

trans-unit.source: In the above example, check_all: True ensures that the task gives the matching answer to each prompt. Without that setting, a task with multiple prompts would give the first answer to every prompt.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中， check_all: True 确保任务为每个提示提供匹配的答案。如果没有该设置，具有多个提示的任务将为每个提示提供第一个答案。

trans-unit.source: In the above example, CentOS machines get the value of ‘42’ for asdf, but other machines get ‘10’. This can be used not only to set variables, but also to apply certain roles to only certain systems.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，CentOS计算机的asdf值为'42'，而其他计算机的值为'10'。这不仅可以用于设置变量，还可以将某些角色仅应用于某些系统。

trans-unit.source: In the above example, a script is run from the testing server against a remote node prior to bringing it back into the pool.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的例子中,在将远程节点带回池中之前,先从测试服务器对远程节点运行一个脚本。

trans-unit.source: In the above example, if more than 3 of the 10 servers in the group were to fail, the rest of the play would be aborted.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的例子中,如果组内10个服务器中有3个以上的服务器出现故障,那么剩下的游戏就会中止。

trans-unit.source: In the above example, if the variable ‘some_variable’ is not defined, Ansible uses the default value 5, rather than raising an “undefined variable” error and failing. If you are working within a role, you can also add a defaults/main.yml to define the default values for variables in your role.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，如果未定义变量“ some_variable”，则Ansible将使用默认值5，而不是引发“未定义的变量”错误和失败。如果您在角色中工作，则还可以添加 defaults/main.yml 来定义角色中变量的默认值。

trans-unit.source: In the above example, if the variable ‘some_variable’ is not defined, the value used will be 5, rather than an error being raised.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，如果未定义变量“ some_variable”，则使用的值为5，而不是引发错误。

trans-unit.source: In the above example, the CIM instance is a representation of the class MSFT_xWebAuthenticationInformation. This class accepts four boolean variables, Anonymous, Basic, Digest, and Windows. The keys to use in a [CimInstance] depend on the class it represents. Please read through the documentation of the resource to determine the keys that can be used and the types of each key value. The class definition is typically located in the <resource name>.schema.mof.
